DataElement.preferredName: Pathology Review Slide Proliferating Cell Count
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric value that represents the count of proliferating cells determined during pathologic review of the sample slide(s).

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Pathology Review Slide Device Component Proliferation Cell Count
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The act of appraisal, evaluation, or analysis._The medical science, and specialty practice, concerned with all aspects of disease, but with special reference to the essential nature, causes, and development of abnormal conditions, as well as the structural and functional changes that result from the disease processes. Informally used to mean the result of such an examination._A flat rectangular piece of glass on which specimens can be mounted for microscopic study._Multiplying or increasing in number._A procedure to determine the number of cells in a sample. Also used to mean the result of such a procedure.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The medical science, and specialty practice, concerned with all aspects of disease, but with special reference to the essential nature, causes, and development of abnormal conditions, as well as the structural and functional changes that result from the disease processes. Informally used to mean the result of such an examination.:The act of appraisal, evaluation, or analysis.

Concepts.definition: The medical science, and specialty practice, concerned with all aspects of disease, but with special reference to the essential nature, causes, and development of abnormal conditions, as well as the structural and functional changes that result from the disease processes. The act of appraisal, evaluation, or analysis.

Property.preferredName: Slide Device Component Proliferation Cell Count
Property.preferredDefinition: A flat rectangular piece of glass on which specimens can be mounted for microscopic study.:Multiplying or increasing in number.  In biology, cell proliferation occurs by a process known as cell division.:A procedure to determine the number of cells in a sample. Also used to mean the result of such a procedure.

Concepts.definition: A flat rectangular piece of glass on which specimens can be mounted for microscopic study.
A procedure to determine the number of cells in a sample.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: To determine the number or amount of something; the result of this activity.

Concepts.definition: Determining the number or amount of something.
